text:
@realDonaldTrump .@realDonaldTrump 

Sir,

So far you've been able to get away with many lies.
The #coronavirus is a very serious issue.
Please do not lie to the American people about it.
The virus does not know about politics or lies.
The only way to beat it is with truth and science.

domain.name: Person

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
